metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1624 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the xdg.BaseDirectory.get_runtime_dir function in python-xdg 0.25 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files by pre-creating /tmp/pyxdg-runtime-dir-fallback-victim to point to a victim-owned location, then replacing it with a symlink to an attacker-controlled location once the get_runtime_dir function is called.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-xdg - 0.25-4
python3-xdg - 0.25-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pyxdg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.25-4').
